ygData.subject: Re: Alliance VS Maximals
ygData.msgSnippet: Squizzy:: She followed Dark One.  She noticed he wasn t going to to talk to her or tell her anything.  She followed him in silence. ... there, he ... stumbling

Squizzy::

She followed Dark One.  She noticed he wasn't going to to talk to her 
or tell her anything.  She followed him in silence.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Jason, who were your chars firing at? Oblitertron is no longer 
there, he 
> split back up into the seperate bots.
> 
> ::The Oblitercons/DevilDuer/Zardus::
> 
> DevilDuer puts up his hands to block his face from the shots, 
stumbling 
> backwards and tripping over a rock. He sits up, getting to his feet 
and 
> swearing.
> 
> "Zardus, we might need a bitta help here," he says into his comm as 
he fires 
> his stun gun again at Astral, not sure of how long he could go on 
fighting.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Dark One looks at Squizzy, frowning. "You need a CR chamber. Follow 
me, I 
> need to get back to the battle."
> 
> One of the blast panels slides back into the cealing, Dark One 
setting off at 
> a walk, not giving any more information.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Breakdown growls as a shot hits him in the side, his three guns 
swirling 
> around to open fire on Starlight.
> 
> Several sparks jump from his wound, hitting the ground and sizzling 
on the 
> foliage.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Pyro jumps back as he sees Griplash, getting a slash on his chest 
as he 
> avoids most of the attack.
> 
> The slash burns, Pyro pulling out his own sword and slashing it at 
the 
> Lavacon.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Hiss swirls in time for a few shots to graze him in the side, 
firing back at 
> the bot that had fired on him.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scavanger grunts as shots pummel him, transforming into robot mode 
and 
> stumbling a bit before raising his gun, mech fuid leaking out of 
his chest as 
> he opens fire on the big Lavacon.
